turns.content: list out the name of 10 mexican dish recipes, and include the link to the original recipe on each

Sure, here are 10 Mexican dish recipes with links to their original recipes:

1. Tacos al Pastor - A delicious and popular street food in Mexico, made with marinated pork, pineapple, and onions. Recipe: <https://www.mexicoinmykitchen.com/tacos-al-pastor-recipe/>
2. Chiles Rellenos - Stuffed poblano peppers filled with cheese or meat, then battered and fried. Recipe: <https://www.isabeleats.com/chiles-rellenos-recipe/>
3. Enchiladas Rojas - Tortillas filled with shredded chicken, then covered in a spicy tomato sauce and baked with cheese. Recipe: <https://www.themediterraneandish.com/enchiladas-rojas-recipe/>
4. Guacamole - A classic dip made with mashed avocados, onions, tomatoes, and lime juice. Recipe: <https://www.simplyrecipes.com/recipes/perfect_guacamole/>
5. Pozole - A hearty soup made with hominy, meat (usually pork), and a variety of spices. Recipe: <https://www.bonappetit.com/recipe/pozole-rojo>
6. Quesadillas - Tortillas filled with cheese (and sometimes other ingredients like chicken or beans), then cooked until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is crispy. Recipe: <https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a22565432/quesadilla-recipe/>
7. Tamales - Corn dough filled with meat, cheese, or vegetables, then steamed in a corn husk. Recipe: <https://www.mexicoinmykitchen.com/how-to-make-tamales/>
8. Sopaipillas - Fried dough served with honey or cinnamon sugar. Recipe: <https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/20590/sopaipillas/>
9. Carne Asada - Grilled beef marinated in lime juice, garlic, and spices. Recipe: <https://www.food.com/recipe/authentic-mexican-carne-asada-159141>
10. Churros - Fried dough coated in cinnamon sugar, often served with a side of chocolate sauce for dipping. Recipe: <https://www.biggerbolderbaking.com/homemade-churros/>
